summary: Tested Contacts Module (CRM básico) for MindoraMap. Backend API tests: 23/23 passed (100%). Frontend UI verification: All core features working - tabs, CRUD operations, custom fields configuration, search functionality.
critical_code_review_comments: VERIFIED: Backend contacts routes in server.py lines 4634-4850 implement full CRUD for contacts and custom fields
VERIFIED: ContactsPage.jsx implements complete UI with tabs (Clientes, Prospectos, Proveedores)
VERIFIED: Custom fields support 3 types: text, select, multiselect with color options
VERIFIED: Contacts sorted by created_at descending (most recent first)
VERIFIED: DockSidebar.jsx includes Contactos navigation link
VERIFIED: MindMapApp.jsx renders ContactsPage when activeView='contacts'
VERIFIED: Form validation for required fields (nombre, apellidos, whatsapp)
VERIFIED: Search functionality filters contacts by name, apellidos, whatsapp, email
seed_data_creation: Test contacts and custom fields created during testing were cleaned up after tests completed
context_for_next_testing_agent: Contacts module is fully functional. Backend has 7 API endpoints: GET/POST/PUT/DELETE for contacts, GET/POST/DELETE for custom fields. Frontend has ContactsPage component with 3 tabs, search, create/edit/delete modals, and custom fields configuration modal.

backend_get_contacts.description: Returns list of contacts, supports contact_type filter

backend_create_contact.description: Creates contact with required fields and custom_fields

backend_contacts_sorting.description: Contacts sorted by created_at descending (most recent first)

backend_get_custom_fields.description: Returns custom field configuration for contact type

backend_create_custom_field_select.description: Creates select type custom field with options

backend_create_custom_field_multiselect.description: Creates multiselect type custom field with options

frontend_contacts_navigation.description: Contactos link in sidebar navigates to ContactsPage

frontend_tabs_display.description: Three tabs displayed: Clientes, Prospectos, Proveedores

frontend_tab_switching.description: Clicking tabs switches view and loads correct contacts

frontend_create_contact_modal.description: Create modal opens with form fields (nombre, apellidos, whatsapp, email)

frontend_search_functionality.description: Search filters contacts by name, apellidos, whatsapp, email

frontend_configure_fields_modal.description: Configure fields modal shows existing fields and create form

frontend_custom_field_types.description: Three field types available: Campo de texto, Selector (combo), Selector múltiple

frontend_edit_contact.description: Edit button opens modal with pre-filled data

frontend_empty_state.description: Empty state shown when no contacts in tab with 'Crear' button

api_endpoints_verified: GET /api/contacts - List all contacts with optional type filter
ui_components_verified: ContactsPage.jsx - Main component with tabs and table
MindMapApp.jsx - Renders ContactsPage for contacts view
Create/Edit Contact Modal - Form with validation
Configure Fields Modal - Custom field management
Contact Table - Displays contacts with actions
